publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2556# Dr Sylvia Jackson: Sheep Farming around Loch Katrine-That the Parliament notes West of Scotland Water's decision to cease its sheep farming operations around Loch Katrine; recognises the potential effects this could have on the Trossachs community; further notes the discussions that West of Scotland Water is now having with local community groups, and urges West of Scotland Water to work with all organisations, including the Scottish Executive, to fully investigate the environmental, social and economic impact this decision will have on the area and to use the integrated catchment management plan as a basis to find solutions to sustain the local community.
S1M-2556# Sheep Farming around Loch Katrine (lodged on 18 December 2001) Mr Brian Monteith*
S1M-2556# Sheep Farming around Loch Katrine (lodged on 18 December 2001) Mr Jamie McGrigor*
